article_title: Clift: GOP Will 'Exploit The Hell' Out of CA Attack To 'Create As Much Fear' As They Can
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

The Daily Beast’s Eleanor Clift argued the GOP will “going to exploit the hell out of” the San Bernardino attack on Friday’s “McLaughlin Group.”

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

When asked to give a letter grade to how much the San Bernardino attack will hurt President Obama politically, Clift stated, “I give it a C, and the Republicans are going to exploit the hell out of this and create as much fear as they possibly can.”

Follow Ian Hanchett on Twitter @IanHanchett
